name: Planner for Korean Learning | Notion
description: The Planner for Korean Learning template helps you by keeping your language learning organized and visual. You can use it to set goals, weekly tasks, organize the new words you are learning, etc. The objective is to make learning a language (in this case Korean) easier and accessible for everyone interested in it.In the Planner for Korean Learning you will have:A database with tasks you can choose to do each week.A widget with some useful tools for Korean (Papago and Mirinae).A list of resources
features: A database with tasks you can choose to do each week.; A widget with some useful tools for Korean (Papago and Mirinae).; A list of resources and exercises.; A list of Goals and Tasks.; Clean and minimalistic aesthetic.; In the price box, enter de m√≠nimum amount or more to get the template.; You will receive an e-mail with the access link.; You only need to have a Notion account and duplicate the template.; Customize the template to your needs, and then you are ready!
